info.name: webnovel.com dark theme
info.description:
webnovel.com dark theme to change the rssbook sites like the chaptersites with night mode.
(on all webnovel pages applicable except chapter sites)
Chapter Sites are designed for the yellow theme from webnovel.
info.additionalInfo:

20.11.2017 - adjustments for subsites (Book details)

01.08.2018 - adjustments for mobilsites
30.08.2018 - adjustments for subsites
